# Hello and welcome to my website!

::: {style="text-align: justify;"}
I am Menasha Senanayaka, who is passionate in research and eager to use statistical methods to solve problems. A hard-working, responsible, adaptable, and fast-learning individual who has specialised statistics. Keen in searching for new concepts in the field of statistics. Interested in statistics and data science. I am looking forward for my higher studies journey.

On this website, I offer a glimpse into my knowledge by sharing some of my work which includes  <a href="https://menashabs.github.io/1_projects/">Projects</a>, <a href="https://menashabs.github.io/2_experience/" target="_blank">Experience</a>, <a href="https://menashabs.github.io/3_workshops/" target="_blank">Workshops</a> and <a href="https://menashabs.github.io/4_blogposts/" target="_blank">Blog Posts</a>.

Feel free to <a href="https://menashabs.github.io/5_contact/">contact</a> me for any inquiry, comments or statistical consultancy. 
:::
